```
   $(".sparkline").sparkline("html",{
➊     lineColor: "dimgray",
➋     fillColor: **false**,
➌     defaultPixelsPerValue: 1,
➍     spotColor: "red",
       minSpotColor: "red",
       maxSpotColor: "red",
➎     normalRangeMin: 82,
       normalRangeMax: 180,
   });
```

```
   $("#composite-chart4 .details")
       .sparkline([
➊         stock[idx].low,
           Math.min(stock[idx].open,stock[idx].close),
           stock[idx].adj_close,
           Math.max(stock[idx].open,stock[idx].close),
           stock[idx].high
       ], {
           type: "box",
           showOutliers: **false**,
➋         medianColor: (stock[idx].open < stock[idx].close)
➌          ? "green" : "red"
       });
```
